value.title: Reminder - Install WebView2 to Get Latest Updates from Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: This video, is the reminder for the updating your system with WebView2 if you want to receive, Power BI Desktop updates from February 2022. value.title: Power BI Desktop Download or Microsoft Store App   Which One is better
value.excerpt: If you want to develop Power BI reports, you'll need the Power BI Desktop application. However, Power BI Desktop application comes in two ways; Download it separately and install it on your Windows machine, or Get it from Microsoft Store as an App. The question that I often get is; What is the difference?

value.title: Loading a File from OneDrive Personal into Power BI Desktop

This article today shows how you can load data from OneDrive Personal (stored in the cloud) directly

value.title: The Most Important Update to Power BI Desktop, Ever!

The super feature that has been released is an update to composite models using direct query of online datasets. The implications of [...]Read

value.title: Use DAX time intelligence functions in Power BI Desktop models
value.excerpt: By the end of this module, youâ€™ll learn the meaning of time intelligence and how to add time intelligence DAX calculations to your model. These calculations will include year-to-date (YTD), year-over-year (YoY) growth, and others.

value.title: Write DAX formulas for Power BI Desktop models
value.excerpt: In this module, you'll learn how to write DAX formulas to create calculated tables, calculated columns, and measures, which are different types of model calculations. Additionally, you'll learn how to write and format DAX formulas, which consist of expressions that use functions, operators, references to model objects, constants, and variables.

value.title: Design interactive data experiences with Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: Power BI enables report authors to produce interactive reports using visuals, slicers, bookmarks, and more.

value.title: 3 Best practices when transforming data in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: In this video, I go through the what I believe are best practices for cleaning your data in Power BI: 1. Rename your query steps 2. Change Data types to all columns 3.
